H0.text: the joint between a coxal bone of the pelvis and the sacrum. Iliosacral Joint

H1.text: the joint between a coxal bone of the pelvis and the sacrum. Lumbosacral Joint

H2.text: the joint between a coxal bone of the pelvis and the sacrum. Pubic Symphysis

H3.text: the joint between a coxal bone of the pelvis and the sacrum. sacroiliac joint

A4.text: The sacroiliac joint or SI joint (SIJ) is the joint between the sacrum and the ilium bones of the pelvis.
